text.name: info1
text.text: The Magnavox Odyssey², also known as Philips Odyssey² is a second generation home video game console released in 1978. It was sold in Europe as the Philips Videopac G7000, in Brazil as the Philips Odyssey.

text.name: info1
text.text: O Philips Videopac+ G7400 é o sucessor do Philips Videopac G7000. Lançado em quantidades limitadas em 1983 e apenas na Europa.

text.text: 飞利浦Videopac+ G7400是第三代家用视频游戏机，于1983年限量发售，仅在欧洲发售；计划在美国发布作为Odyssey³ Command Center的版本，但从未实现。G7400是飞利浦Videopac G7000的后继产品。
